QUD.string: {How is the way things are at t0?}
{What does Susie do before each shift?}
QUD.UNIT: She scrubs her face pink before each shift.

QUD.string: {Why does she scrub her face pink?}
QUD.UNIT: A single flake of dead skin can ruin a microchip.
But the factory is vacuum-dryalso: Something else is vaccum-dry

QUD.string: {What does Susie have to do with the factory?}
QUD.UNIT: and she has to moisturize often.
She can only afford sunflower oil.
she breathes the bitter staleness of cooking oil

QUD.string: {Where is the bitter staleness of the cooking oil?}

QUD.UNIT: her mouth fills with the rat-grey feel of it.

QUD.string: {What will Mr Johnson do at t6?}
QUD.UNIT: Mr Johnson will insist on dinner.

QUD.string: {Regardless of what will Mr Johnson insist on dinner?}
